pages.title: Monarch Butterfly
pages.text: The monarch butterfly or simply monarch ($(o)Danaus plexippus$()) is a milkweed butterfly ($(o)subfamily Danainae$()) in the family Nymphalidae.$(br2)Other common names, depending on region, include milkweed, common tiger, wanderer, and black-veined brown.

pages.title: Monarch Butterfly
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:dandelion$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: None Days
